All as per

properties.Observatio: A well-planned and implemented community water scheme. But daily maintenance is not done properly. A filter tank with a � of about 12m and a water stock tank with a � of about 15m  have been constructed. But no covers have been provided for them.

properties.Observatio: A small water storage tank has been built near the spring, but it is in a dilapidated condition. 15 families obtained water from this project. The source is located in the Tea Estate, so waste accumulates.
